Tables

On This Page

  • Table

Table

Our default table is simple and uncluttered without vertical borders.

Platform UI tables are built to be responsive at all screen sizes! Make them responsive by adding a data-label on every <td> to match the column header label.

Demo

Menu Item Size Price

Pork Buns

Large

$8.99

Pork Buns

Small

$5.99

Markup

<table class="table">
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Menu Item</th>
      <th>Size</th>
      <th>Price</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td data-label="Menu Item">
        Pork Buns
      </td>
      <td data-label="Size">
        Large
      </td>
      <td data-label="Price">
        $8.99
      </td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td data-label="Menu Item">
        Pork Buns
      </td>
      <td data-label="Size">
        Small
      </td>
      <td data-label="Price">
        $5.99
      </td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

Modifiers

Modifier † Behavior
table--no-hover

Removes the hover effect on tables and rows.
unresponsive

Removes responsive behavior.

† The base class is always required.

Add the utility class overflow-xâ€”auto to make the table scroll horizontally too! This is a good idea when making the table unresponsive.

  • Table
Platform UI

Built by the Ritter Insurance Marketing development team, aka RIMdev, to power our platform of staff and agent tools.

Platform UI is available on npm and uses SkellyCSS, also on npm and github

Current version 1.6.3

©2023 Ritter Insurance Marketing
